welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Miguel, El Salvador! Known for its vibrant culture, rich history, and beautiful colonial architecture, we hope you enjoy exploring all that this charming city has to offer. Embrace the local cuisine, lively markets, and friendly locals as you make unforgettable memories here.
